title: Compass Precision Purchases Trutron Corporation
summary: CHARLOTTE, N.C.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Compass Precision, LLC, a Charlotte-based manufacturer of custom, close-tolerance metal components for mission-critical applications, announced Tuesday it has acquired Trutron Corporation in Troy, Michigan. Founded in 1967, Trutron is a leading manufacturer of extreme precision, complex geometry parts. The company services several industries, including primarily aerospace.
